patch_note:
Version 1.3.0

Bug Report & Issues Report Feature
– Easily provide feedback for a better experience.

Text Input Basic Reviewer
– Identify and input answers efficiently.

Font Size Adjustment
– Customize font size in theme settings.

Revamped Daily Rewards UI
– A smoother and more intuitive claiming process.

Improvements & Adjustments

Dark Mode UI Tweaks
– Improved readability for a better visual experience.

Credits Rewards System Refinements
– More balanced and fairer rewards.

Enhanced Credit Usage
– Smoother and more seamless transactions.

General UI Enhancements
– A sleeker and more polished look.

Bug Fixes & Stability
– Performance improvements and optimizations for a more stable experience.

ai_models.description: A small version of the Mistral model, optimized for efficiency and speed.
A powerful model with 12 billion parameters, designed for advanced image recognition.
An open-source model from the Mistral family, ideal for NLP and text generation tasks.
A medium-sized Mistral model, offering a balanced performance for various applications.
